imagingbook-common 4.0-SNAPSHOT API

Common library used by the ImageJ plugins provided for Digital Image Processing books authored by Wilhelm Burger and Mark J Burge, published by Springer. See also www.imagingbook.com.

Permission to use and distribute this software is granted under the BSD 2-Clause "Simplified" License (see http://opensource.org/licenses/BSD-2-Clause). Copyright (c) 2006-2021 Wilhelm Burger, Mark J. Burge. All rights reserved.

Requires Java 1.8 or higher.

imagingbook.pub.geometry.delaunay
This package contains implementation of the Delaunay triangulation in 2D.
imagingbook.pub.geometry.delaunay.chew
Implementation of the incremental triangulation algorithm proposed by Paul Chew.
imagingbook.pub.geometry.delaunay.guibas
Implementation of the randomized incremental algorithm described in Guibas, Knuth, Sharir, "Randomized incremental construction of Delaunay and Voronoi diagrams", Algorithmica, no.
